original_text: Dream is like the stars in the sky, maybe you can never touch, but if you follow them, they will lead you to find the way of life. 梦想就像天上的星星，也许你永远无法触碰，但如果你跟随它们，它们将引领你找到人生的路。【 @全球美剧电影 】
